plot: In the Rockies, a Search and Rescue patrol deal with love and romance as they do their jobs, facing all kinds of dare devils living the extreme.
plot_en: In the Rockies, a Search and Rescue patrol deal with love and romance as they do their jobs, facing all kinds of dare devils living the extreme.
plot_es: In the Rockies, a Search and Rescue patrol deal with love and romance as they do their jobs, facing all kinds of dare devils living the extreme.
title: Extreme
